name: SmartSecurityLight
0:
”Alexa, ask Light Camera to turn off lighting mode for living room”
”Alexa, ask Light Camera to turn on lighting mode for living room”
”Alexa, ask Light Camera to turn off living room lighting mode”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: light camera
des: This is a smart security garden lamp built-in with a 1080P HD wireless security camera, perfect for people who attach much importance to home security. 1080P video allows you to get all the details you need without the need to strain your eyes. You can easily connect the security light to the network via Wi-Fi or Ethernet cable. And after installing the viewing app on Android or iOS devices, you can see whatever the camera sees from anywhere. This chic and easy-to-use smart security light is designed to make home surveillance a breeze for you.
